about_the_game:
◆Story


《Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River》 is an addictive 2D side-scrolling adventure game with a story full of challenges and exciting erotic elements. Players take on the role of Brother Ambrosio, a Dominican from Madrid, as he embarks on an adventure on a mysterious island where he must confront the lust of Devil's Cove, defeat exciting bosses, and have passionate interactions with a variety of characters. From the city of San Salvador to the Plains of Wind, there's no shortage of hot scenes to immerse players in fascinating adventures and challenge them in a labyrinth of desire. 《Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River》 is an exciting and challenging adventure with breathtaking plot developments and tantalizing emotional elements.

As the story unfolds, you'll experience everything from the chaos of San Salvador to the evil spirits of the Wind Plains, testing your courage and ingenuity every step of the way.The mysterious web of Cthulhu is a deep draw for any adventurer, adding a layer of mystery to the whole story.

The game pays special attention to emotional elements, creating heart-pounding storylines through the ambiguous relationships between characters and deep human struggles. Elaborate CG imagery expresses the erotic elements to the fullest, presenting players with a visual feast of seduction.
From the debauchery of Devil's Bay to the excitement of boss battles, the island is filled with characters who each play an integral role in the story and add to the richness of the adventure.

《Clavis Kinkygate: Treasure of Danau River》 features groundbreaking erotic elements, a compelling storyline, and elements of Cthulhu mythology that lead players into a fantasy realm of excitement, challenge, and seduction.Get ready for a thrilling adventure as you unravel the mystery of the secret of gold.

◆Gameplay


The game is presented in a 2D landscape scrolling format, allowing players to immerse themselves in well-designed graphics and scenarios as they guide Father Ambrosio through cities, mountains and caves, challenging bosses and solving plot puzzles.

The game will take you through a series of stages, from the sea to the city and deep into the mountains and caves, and as you battle various bosses, you will be constantly challenged to solve the mystery of the story, and the interactive elements of the game will determine the development of your plot.

◆Game Features


◇20 basic CGs, containing more than 150 differentials, presenting a rich visual style in the game.
◇The game text is up to 60,000 words, which will lead the player deep into the core of the plot.
◇One main female character and three secondary female characters, each of whom will play a key role in the story.
◇Deep plot and Cthulhu elements make the game even more intriguing.
◇Three different endings, including a hidden ending where the player's choice will affect the final development of the story.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
